items.content_html:
Watched the Superman teaser this morning. I’m wary, but cautiously optimistic. I think James Gunn and David Corenswet understand who Superman is. I just hope they help everyone else understand it too.

That said, there are… a lot of other characters appearing in this teaser. Maybe too many?
